snippet: The day after his inauguration as mayor of New York, Bill de Blasio introduced himself to a wary police force and confronted a major winter storm, the city’s first of 2014.
abstract: Bill de Blasio, in his first full day as New York City's mayor, introduces himself to a wary police force, navigates unfamiliar hallways with skeletal staff and confronts imminent winter storm that might have rattled even the most experienced municipal manager; new mayor also faces growing political headache as questions emerge over harsh words directed at former Mayor Michael R Bloomberg by several speakers at inaugural ceremony.
lead_paragraph: The day after his inauguration as mayor of New York, Bill de Blasio introduced himself to a wary police force and confronted a major winter storm, the city’s first of 2014.

headline.main: At Work, de Blasio Finds Full Plate of Headaches
headline.print_headline: At Work, Mayor Finds Full Plate Of Headaches
